content:
Bohemian Logical & Philosophical Café

Michael Makkai
Notions of identity for and in higher dimensional categories.

January 26 at 16.00 Prague time (GMT+1)
The zoom link is on the webpage:
https://bohemianlpc.github.io
Makkai’s abstract is at this link:
https://bohemianlpc.github.io/abstracts/Makkai.pdf
Regards, Steve

Unfortunately, the Bohemian L&P Cafe talk didn't work - technical difficulties spoiled the talk.
We'll try again soon with an upgraded internet connection or something.
Thanks for your patience - I'll post here when we have new date.
